Package ccprog3_mco

Class Board

java.lang.Object
ccprog3_mco.Board
public class Board extends Object
Class: Board Description: Main class used to handle the main gameBoard which include 1. Initializing the Board and its pieces 2. Handling Player movement based on inputs from the Game method 3. Handling special conditions for Lake, Base and Capture
Author:
Lance Ethan S. Ong Nick Jenson S. Crescini S14

    • movePiece

      public boolean movePiece​(int x, int y, char move)
      Method: movePiece Description:Method used as a way to not only move a piece based on user input but also is used as a checker to see whether the move is valid and the respective actions to take once a move is done
      Parameters:
      x - : integer of x coordinates
      y - : integer of y coordinates
      move - : char(W,A,S,D) use to indentify which direction the player wants to move
      Returns:
      true or false: boolean (checks whether move is valid or not)

      Parameters:
      x - : x coordinates
      y - : y coordinates
      Returns:
      board[x][y]: Piece
